<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="device_forever" x="0" y="0"><statement name="HANDLER"><block type="basic_show_arrow"><value name="i"><shadow type="device_arrow"><field name="arrow">ArrowNames.South</field></shadow></value><next><block type="Tinybit_CarCtrl"><field name="index">Tinybit.CarState.Car_Run</field><next><block type="device_pause"><value name="pause"><shadow type="timePicker"><field name="ms">1000</field></shadow></value><next><block type="basic_show_arrow"><value name="i"><shadow type="device_arrow"><field name="arrow">ArrowNames.North</field></shadow></value><next><block type="Tinybit_CarCtrl"><field name="index">Tinybit.CarState.Car_Back</field><next><block type="device_pause"><value name="pause"><shadow type="timePicker"><field name="ms">1000</field></shadow></value><next><block type="basic_show_arrow"><value name="i"><shadow type="device_arrow"><field name="arrow">ArrowNames.East</field></shadow></value><next><block type="Tinybit_CarCtrl"><field name="index">Tinybit.CarState.Car_SpinLeft</field><next><block type="device_pause"><value name="pause"><shadow type="timePicker"><field name="ms">1000</field></shadow></value><next><block type="basic_show_arrow"><value name="i"><shadow type="device_arrow"><field name="arrow">ArrowNames.West</field></shadow></value><next><block type="Tinybit_CarCtrl"><field name="index">Tinybit.CarState.Car_SpinRight</field><next><block type="device_pause"><value name="pause"><shadow type="timePicker"><field name="ms">1000</field></shadow></value><next><block type="device_show_leds"><field name="LEDS">`
        . . # . . 
        . # # # . 
        # # # # # 
        # # # # # 
        . # . # .
        `</field><next><block type="Tinybit_CarCtrl"><field name="index">Tinybit.CarState.Car_Stop</field><next><block type="device_pause"><value name="pause"><shadow type="timePicker"><field name="ms">1000</field></shadow></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></xml>
main.ts:
basic.forever(function () {
    basic.showArrow(ArrowNames.South)
    Tinybit.CarCtrl(Tinybit.CarState.Car_Run)
    basic.pause(1000)
    basic.showArrow(ArrowNames.North)
    Tinybit.CarCtrl(Tinybit.CarState.Car_Back)
    basic.pause(1000)
    basic.showArrow(ArrowNames.East)
    Tinybit.CarCtrl(Tinybit.CarState.Car_SpinLeft)
    basic.pause(1000)
    basic.showArrow(ArrowNames.West)
    Tinybit.CarCtrl(Tinybit.CarState.Car_SpinRight)
    basic.pause(1000)
    basic.showLeds(`
        . . # . .
        . # # # .
        # # # # #
        # # # # #
        . # . # .
        `)
    Tinybit.CarCtrl(Tinybit.CarState.Car_Stop)
    basic.pause(1000)
})
